value:
$bEvBg_Svartalf|$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Zzz... Zzz...$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|Wh-where am—$k$p...Had I fallen asleep again?$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|Yes. You had.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I know this is no time to be sleeping...
The nothingness is even making its
way into dreams.$k$pBut...together...we can beat it...
So let's do...our bes... Zzz...$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|Let's.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Smile|*snore*$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|...$k$pThis is Lady Freyja's dream...
She must be in this world
somewhere. I will find her.$k$pI will keep her safe, no matter what
it costs me...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|You will not.$k$pYou will not see her. I will not
allow it. I will see your wishes
remain ever unfulfilled.$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Who are you?$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|I am the destroyer of dreams,
the ruin of hope... I am the one
who rules nothingness.$k$p

$bEvBg_Svartalf|$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face|Zzz... H-huh? Triandra?$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Urg... *cough*$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Why are you carrying me?
What's happening?$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Run, Mirabilis. You need to leave.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What happened? Y-you're hurt!
Triandra, if you're not careful, you'll...$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Go. Tell Peony what happened.
Tell her to find Lady Freyja...$k$pTell her I learned...the álfar alone
are not enough to defeat the
nothingness...$k$pGo now. Hurry... You must—$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|I forbid you. I will not allow it.$k$pNo álfar will be tolerated.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|That voice... Even just the voice
is terrifying! What do we do?!$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face_Cool|You need to go, Mirabilis. Flee! Now!$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I-I'm...too scared to move!$k$p$EFace_Cool|Besides...I can't just leave you here
in the state you're in!$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face|Mirabilis...you...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|In the name of nothingness...$k$pGreet oblivion, wretched dream!$k$p$WmMEID_スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No!$k$p

$WmMPID_ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_F_Normal,Face|It seems Lysithea and Ferdinand are
doing everything they can to make
the tea party a success.$k$p$WmMPID_ベレト,ch17_00_Byleth_M_Normal,Face|Their outfits suit them.$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_F_Teatime23,Face|Professors! Thank you for coming.$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会フェルディ,ch17_07_Ferdinant_M_Teatime23,Face|This way, both of you. I've prepared
the finest teas you are likely to ever
taste again.$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_F_Teatime23,Face|I conducted endless research to make
sure the baked goods were just right.$k$pHere is the first tray of treats.
There are two more that will
be brought out later on.$k$p$WmMPID_ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_F_Normal,Face|Thank you...but you two don't need
make a fuss over us.$k$p

$WmMPID_お茶会フェルディ,ch17_07_Ferdinant_M_Teatime23,Face|Professors! How would you like
another cup of tea?$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_F_Teatime23,Face|There are still more treats as well!$k$p$WmMPID_ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_F_Normal,Face|No, thank you... I'm already quite
full, I'm afraid.$k$p$WmMPID_ベレト,ch17_00_Byleth_M_Normal,Face|You two made us very comfortable.
Thank you. This was nice.$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_F_Teatime23,Face|Really?$k$pWas it...as good as the tea parties
you always host?$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会フェルディ,ch17_07_Ferdinant_M_Teatime23,Face|We hoped to repay the generosity
you've shown us so many times.$k$p$WmMPID_ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_F_Normal,Face|You don't need to worry about that.$k$p$WmMPID_ベレト,ch17_00_Byleth_M_Normal,Face|Those tea parties are so we can
get to know you better, as your
professors.$k$pYou don't need to repay us for that.$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_F_Teatime23,Face|Be that as it may, I—$k$p$WmMPID_ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_F_Normal,Face|I am glad you have enjoyed the tea
we've been able to share together.$k$pAnd I look forward to the next
occasion we have to share some.$k$p$WmMPID_ベレト,ch17_00_Byleth_M_Normal,Face|You must have learned quite a bit
from all this tea experience. You will
have to tell me about it.$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会リシテア,ch17_23_Lysithea_F_Teatime23,Face|Of course! Much of the process was
new to me, so many of the things I've
learned are still fresh in mind!$k$p$WmMPID_お茶会フェルディ,ch17_07_Ferdinant_M_Teatime23,Face|This may take some time to cover...
Luckily, we've got the best tea
available to sip as we talk!$k$p
